snippet: The Chinese Embassy urged an investigation to determine whether its citizens were specifically targeted.
abstract: Three Chinese workers are found dead under mysterious circumstances in an apartment in central Kabul, prompting Chinese Embassy to urge Afghan government to investigate to determine whether its citizens were specifically targeted.

byline.original: By SHARIFULLAH SAHAK and AZAM AHMED
byline.contributor: Chris Buckley contributed reporting from Hong Kong.

lead_paragraph: The Chinese Embassy urged an investigation to determine whether its citizens were specifically targeted.

headline.main: Bodies of 3 Chinese Workers Found in a Kabul Apartment
headline.print_headline: Bodies of 3 Chinese Workers Found in a Kabul Apartment
